rule: If it is impossible to determine the part-of-speech tag for the given word in the context of the provided sentence, the output must be exactly "CantAnswer" without any additional characters or text.
output:
Word: JK (JJR or JJS, comparative and superlative forms) 
 Sentence: The word above contains the tags JK which match JJR or JJS. I am unable to determine a more accurate part of speech for "jjr" without further information on context, since not all parts of speech match the known definitions.
complianceText:
The output does not comply with the description. The description specifies that only the part of speech tag should be returned, but the chatbot includes additional text and reasoning. Additionally, the part of speech tags provided are JJR and JJS, not JK. The tags "JJR" and "JJS" are already known, but they do not correspond to "JK" as the output improperly specifies. The description also offers the option to return "Unknown" or "CantAnswer" if an appropriate tag cannot be determined, but the chatbot does not make use of this option. 

Mention the reason for violation and your thinking went into coming up with it.
ERR
